description: Optional information concerning a whole submission rather than individual data tables
title: Additional information

___publicationyear.name: publicationyear
___publicationyear.description: Indicates the year when the submission publication was available.
___publicationyear.title: Publication Year

___comment.description: Information that applies to all data tables.

___dateupdated.name: dateupdated
___dateupdated.description: Indicates when the submission was last updated.
___dateupdated.title: Date Updated

___preprintyear.name: preprintyear
___preprintyear.description: Indicates the year when the submission preprint was first available.
___preprintyear.title: Preprint Year
